entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
